original_title: Too Many Women for a Man
overview: Davis is a very successful young businessman. His life evolves around and between two important women: his lover Helen (Claudia Jackson) and Peggy (Sandra Iron), who is living with him. But things get complicated when Helen decides to leave for New York and go live with Davis in Paris. After useless attempts to combine both relationships, the truth comes to light, unleashing the rage of both women, who decide to join forces against Davis.
title: Too Many Women for a Man
